BoosterPacks:Abyss.NAME: Abyss
BoosterPacks:Abyss.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your draw pile, put it and all of its copies in your hand. NL Exhaust.

BoosterPacks:Ambivalent.NAME: Ambivalent
BoosterPacks:Ambivalent.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Discard !M! cards at random. NL Draw !M! cards.

BoosterPacks:Ambush.NAME: Ambush
BoosterPacks:Ambush.DESCRIPTION: Add *Shivs to your hand until you have !M! cards in your hand. NL Exhaust.

BoosterPacks:Animosity.NAME: Animosity
BoosterPacks:Animosity.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !M! additional damage per debuff stack on you or the target.

BoosterPacks:ArcticWind.NAME: Arctic Wind
BoosterPacks:ArcticWind.DESCRIPTION: At the beginning of your turn, Channel 1 Frost.
BoosterPacks:ArcticWind.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the beginning of your turn, Channel 1 Frost.

BoosterPacks:Ashes.NAME: Ashes
BoosterPacks:Ashes.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever a card is Exhausted, return this from your discard pile to your hand.

BoosterPacks:Assassinate.NAME: Assassinate
BoosterPacks:Assassinate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL When manually discarded, cost 1 less until played. NL Add it back to your hand.

BoosterPacks:Audacity.NAME: Audacity
BoosterPacks:Audacity.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL If you draw a Skill, enter boosterpacks:Courage. NL Exhaust.
BoosterPacks:Audacity.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL If you draw a Skill, enter boosterpacks:Courage.

BoosterPacks:Augury.NAME: Augury
BoosterPacks:Augury.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Mantra. NL Add 2 *Visions to your hand.
BoosterPacks:Augury.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL If you draw a Skill, enter boosterpacks:Courage.

BoosterPacks:BlackDeath.NAME: Black Death
BoosterPacks:BlackDeath.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Poison. NL Double this card's Poison, and increase its cost by 1 for this combat.

BoosterPacks:BlackHole.NAME: Black Hole
BoosterPacks:BlackHole.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a Dark is Evoked, trigger the passive ability of ALL Dark orbs. NL Channel !M! Dark.

BoosterPacks:BlazingSword.NAME: Blazing Sword
BoosterPacks:BlazingSword.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is Exhausted, gain !M! Vigor.
BoosterPacks:BlazingSword.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever a card is Exhausted, gain !M! Vigor.

BoosterPacks:Blessing.NAME: Blessing
BoosterPacks:Blessing.DESCRIPTION: boosterpacks:Latent. NL At the start of your turn, gain [E] .

BoosterPacks:BoilingBlood.NAME: Boiling Blood
BoosterPacks:BoilingBlood.DESCRIPTION: At the beginning of your turn, gain !M! Vigor.

BoosterPacks:Bravery.NAME: Bravery
BoosterPacks:Bravery.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Enter boosterpacks:Courage. NL Exhaust.

BoosterPacks:Charge.NAME: Charge
BoosterPacks:Charge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this consumes Vigor, draw !M! card.
BoosterPacks:Charge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this consumes Vigor, draw !M! cards.

BoosterPacks:ChooseCourage.NAME: Courage
BoosterPacks:ChooseCourage.DESCRIPTION: Upon exiting Courage, draw 1 card. NL At the start of your turn, draw 1 card.

BoosterPacks:Climax.NAME: Climax
BoosterPacks:Climax.DESCRIPTION: boosterpacks:Latent. NL Play your next card three times. NL Exhaust.

BoosterPacks:CollapseReality.NAME: Collapse Reality
BoosterPacks:CollapseReality.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust ALL Colorless cards in your hand. NL Gain [E] and draw 1 card for each. NL Exhaust.
BoosterPacks:CollapseReality.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust ALL Colorless cards in your hand. NL Gain [E] and draw 1 card for each.

BoosterPacks:ConductiveStrike.NAME: Conductive Strike
BoosterPacks:ConductiveStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Evoke a copy of your rightmost Orb.

BoosterPacks:Constant.NAME: Constant
BoosterPacks:Constant.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage. NL Gain !M! Block. NL Not affected by statuses.

BoosterPacks:CorrosiveScent.NAME: Corrosive Scent
BoosterPacks:CorrosiveScent.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL If this card is discarded from your hand, apply !M! Poison to ALL enemies.

BoosterPacks:CryOfDespair.NAME: Cry Of Despair
BoosterPacks:CryOfDespair.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL If this card is discarded from your hand, ALL enemies lose !M! temporary Strength.

BoosterPacks:Dauntless.NAME: Dauntless
BoosterPacks:Dauntless.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL If you are in boosterpacks:Courage, gain [W] and exit your Stance.

BoosterPacks:DefyReality.NAME: Defy Reality
BoosterPacks:DefyReality.DESCRIPTION: Scry 5. NL Add !M! *Vision to your hand.
BoosterPacks:DefyReality.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Scry 5. NL Add !M! *Visions to your hand.

BoosterPacks:Desecration.NAME: Desecration
BoosterPacks:Desecration.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !M! cards to add a card from your exhaust pile to your hand. NL It cost 0 this turn.

BoosterPacks:Determination.NAME: Determination
BoosterPacks:Determination.DESCRIPTION: If you are in boosterpacks:Courage, gain !B! Block. NL If not, enter boosterpacks:Courage.

BoosterPacks:DictionaryAttack.NAME: Dictionary Attack
BoosterPacks:DictionaryAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Look at the top !M! cards of your deck, choose one and add it to your hand.

BoosterPacks:DominateReality.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! *Insights and *Smites to your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

BoosterPacks:DoubleEdge.NAME: Double Edge
BoosterPacks:DoubleEdge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain Vigor equal to damage dealt.

BoosterPacks:DuckTyping.NAME: Duck Typing
BoosterPacks:DuckTyping.DESCRIPTION: Evoke all Orbs of the same type as your rightmost one. NL Draw 1 card per Orb Evoked.

BoosterPacks:Empty.NAME: Empty
BoosterPacks:Empty.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add a *Void on top of your draw pile.

BoosterPacks:Encore.NAME: Encore
BoosterPacks:Encore.DESCRIPTION: Whenever your turn is forced to end, draw 1 card, discard 2 cards and continue to play.
BoosterPacks:Encore.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever your turn is forced to end, draw 1 card, discard 2 cards and continue to play.

BoosterPacks:EvasiveManeuver.NAME: Evasive Maneuver
BoosterPacks:EvasiveManeuver.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL If this card is discarded from your hand, gain !B! Block.

BoosterPacks:ForgeReality.NAME: Forge Reality
BoosterPacks:ForgeReality.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Add a *Smite and a *Safety to your hand.

BoosterPacks:FreeWill.NAME: Free Will
BoosterPacks:FreeWill.DESCRIPTION: Scry !M!. NL Draw as much cards as you discarded.

BoosterPacks:Friendship.NAME: Friendship
BoosterPacks:Friendship.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL At the end of this turn, Retain your entire hand. NL Exhaust.
BoosterPacks:Friendship.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL At the end of this turn, Retain your entire hand.

BoosterPacks:GalacticAlgorithm.NAME: Galactic Algorithm
BoosterPacks:GalacticAlgorithm.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Orb Slot. NL Channel 1 Plasma.

BoosterPacks:Gambit.NAME: Gambit
BoosterPacks:Gambit.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card. NL ALL Attacks in your hand cost 1 less this turn. NL Exhaust.
BoosterPacks:Gambit.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL ALL Attacks in your hand cost 1 less this turn. NL Exhaust.

BoosterPacks:GroupTherapy.NAME: Group Therapy
BoosterPacks:GroupTherapy.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose HP equal to their *Mark. NL Apply !M! *Mark to ALL enemies.

BoosterPacks:GutStab.NAME: Gut Stab
BoosterPacks:GutStab.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 3 times. NL Enemy lose !M! temporary Strength.

BoosterPacks:HaltingProblem.NAME: Halting Problem

BoosterPacks:HaltingProblem.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Evoke a copy of each of your Orbs. NL End your turn.

BoosterPacks:Hate.NAME: Hate

BoosterPacks:HiddenStrike.NAME: Hidden Strike
BoosterPacks:HiddenStrike.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL If this card is discarded from your hand, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies

BoosterPacks:HonedBlade.NAME: Honed Blade
BoosterPacks:HonedBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Next turn, gain !M! temporary Strength.

BoosterPacks:InnerDemons.NAME: Inner Demons
BoosterPacks:InnerDemons.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Add a random Curse to your hand.

BoosterPacks:Instinct.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Discard any number of cards from your hand. NL Exhaust.

BoosterPacks:KillingUrge.NAME: Killing Urge
BoosterPacks:KillingUrge.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! *Accuracy.

BoosterPacks:MasterTrick.NAME: Master Trick
BoosterPacks:MasterTrick.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL If this card is discarded from your hand, put a card from your draw pile to your hand.
BoosterPacks:MasterTrick.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL If this card is discarded from your hand, put a card from your draw or discard pile to your hand.

BoosterPacks:Mastery.NAME: Mastery
BoosterPacks:Mastery.DESCRIPTION: Whenever at least 2 *Shivs are added to your hand, adds an additional one.

BoosterPacks:MatrixInversion.NAME: Matrix Inversion
BoosterPacks:MatrixInversion.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Invert the order of your Orbs.

BoosterPacks:Memories.NAME: Memories
BoosterPacks:Memories.DESCRIPTION: Exchange your discard pile and your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
BoosterPacks:Memories.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exchange your discard pile and your draw pile.

BoosterPacks:MindOverMatter.NAME: Mind Over Matter
BoosterPacks:MindOverMatter.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Discard 2 cards. NL Enter boosterpacks:Courage.

BoosterPacks:Mirage.NAME: Mirage
BoosterPacks:Mirage.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a non Curse, non Status Unplayable card, draw 1 card.
BoosterPacks:Mirage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you draw a non Curse, non Status Unplayable card, draw 1 card.

BoosterPacks:MobMentality.NAME: Mob Mentality
BoosterPacks:MobMentality.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw all copies of this card.

BoosterPacks:Multithreading.NAME: Multithreading
BoosterPacks:Multithreading.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, Evoke your rightmost Orb twice.
BoosterPacks:Multithreading.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, Evoke your rightmost Orb twice.

BoosterPacks:Mutilation.NAME: Mutilation
BoosterPacks:Mutilation.DESCRIPTION: boosterpacks:Forgotten. NL Heal 10 HP. NL Lose !M! Max HP. NL Exhaust.

BoosterPacks:Naraka.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you change Stance, ALL enemies lose !M! HP.

BoosterPacks:Nilpotency.NAME: Nilpotency
BoosterPacks:Nilpotency.DESCRIPTION: Put !M! cost 0 cards from your draw pile into your hand.

BoosterPacks:Optimize.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the beginning of your turn, apply 1 Lock-on to ALL enemies.

BoosterPacks:Oracle.NAME: Oracle
BoosterPacks:Oracle.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Scry, Scry 1 more card.
BoosterPacks:Oracle.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you Scry, Scry 1 more card.

BoosterPacks:Overflow.NAME: Overflow

BoosterPacks:ParadigmShift.DESCRIPTION: Lose all Focus. NL Gain double the boosterpacks:Integrity.

BoosterPacks:PhantomStrike.NAME: Phantom Strike

BoosterPacks:Pilgrimage.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Mantra. NL End your turn.
BoosterPacks:Pilgrimage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !M! Mantra. NL End your turn.

BoosterPacks:Polynomial.NAME: Polynomial
BoosterPacks:Polynomial.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! + !M!X damage to ALL enemies. NL Cannot drain more than [B] .

BoosterPacks:Prophecy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you enter Divinity, put !M! cards from your draw pile into your hand.

BoosterPacks:Quagmire.NAME: Quagmire
BoosterPacks:Quagmire.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add !M! *Debris into your hand.

BoosterPacks:RecursiveCall.NAME: Recursive Call
BoosterPacks:RecursiveCall.DESCRIPTION: Every time you play 4 cards in a turn, Channel a copy of your leftmost orb.

BoosterPacks:Register.NAME: Register
BoosterPacks:Register.DESCRIPTION: Draw X cards. NL Cannot drain more than [B] .
BoosterPacks:Register.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw X+1 cards. NL Cannot drain more than [B] .

BoosterPacks:Reincarnation.DESCRIPTION: Gain X Strength. NL Gain X Dexterity. NL End your turn. NL Exhaust.

BoosterPacks:Reprieve.NAME: Reprieve
BoosterPacks:Reprieve.DESCRIPTION: boosterpacks:Forgotten. NL Heal !M! HP. NL Exhaust.

BoosterPacks:Respite.NAME: Respite

BoosterPacks:Revenge.NAME: Revenge
BoosterPacks:Revenge.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you lose HP, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

BoosterPacks:Scythe.NAME: Scythe
BoosterPacks:Scythe.DESCRIPTION: Lose 1 HP and deal !D! damage !M! times.

BoosterPacks:SecretArsenal.NAME: Secret Arsenal

BoosterPacks:Shinigami.NAME: Shinigami

BoosterPacks:Shinobi.NAME: Shinobi
BoosterPacks:Shinobi.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL If this card is discarded from your hand, add !M! *Shivs+ to your hand.

BoosterPacks:Silence.NAME: Silence

BoosterPacks:SomberOmen.NAME: Somber Omen
BoosterPacks:SomberOmen.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply Weak, apply !M! Poison as well.

BoosterPacks:StaticWave.NAME: Static Wave

BoosterPacks:StaticWave.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Activate the passive effect of each of your Orbs.

BoosterPacks:StrikeOfTheFallen.NAME: Strike Of The Fallen
BoosterPacks:StrikeOfTheFallen.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !M! additional damage per card in your exhaust pile.

BoosterPacks:TacticalAdvantage.NAME: Tactical Advantage
BoosterPacks:TacticalAdvantage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy does not have Poison, apply !M! Poison. NL Exhaust.

BoosterPacks:Trinity.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If you are in Divinity, deal triple damage and exit your Stance.

BoosterPacks:Twilight.NAME: Twilight
BoosterPacks:Twilight.DESCRIPTION: boosterpacks:Latent. NL Channel 1 Dark per Orb slot. NL Exhaust.
BoosterPacks:Twilight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Channel 1 Dark per Orb slot. NL Exhaust.

BoosterPacks:Valor.NAME: Valor

BoosterPacks:Worsening.NAME: Worsening
